Name: noob
AboutMe:
About Me: I am a computer programmer who happens to be Co-Founder of a startup. We make Games, apps, websites, web apps and many more stuff here.
I am a Top Writer on Quora and can be usually found there - Quora Profile.

Want to get trained by me?
We're starting to train young minds like you to think like an expert programmer. Currently we're starting batches for Game Development only. You can expect more advanced level training for other areas (Mobile App Development and Web Development) soon. Send a mail at training[AT]noobgames.in for details. We provide workshops on various aspects of programming for colleges. Contact us if you represent an educational institute. Otherwise feel free to read my blog here - Learn Programming.

Need Internship/Job?
For internships, read The announcement for Noobs.
If you're trying to get a job at my company, please email our HR team at hr[AT]noobgames.in.
